about_the_game:
Thrust yet again onto the world of the Soul Stones, discover all-new content written from the perspective of different characters in the series. Familiar faces and new alike make an appearance to cast a broader light on the happenings behind the scenes. View events past and present through the eyes of the people involved and gain a greater understanding of the stakes at play.

Web of Shadows is a 14000 compilation of short stories by Morgan Vane. The stories are non-interactive and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

Witness scenes and events from the point of view of the major characters in Cridevar. Manerkol, his Court, your companions and their families—they all play a role in this web of shadows that you’re tangled in. Knowledge is power, and gathering information under a different perspective concerning both the past and the present could make all the difference. What secrets does the world of Talhamsyn keep from you?

The time to find out is now.

  • Step into the shoes of the major power players pulling the strings in the world’s cutthroat politics.
  • Learn more about your companions’ pasts.
  • Glimpse into Manerkol’s motivations and his way of governing.
  • Gain a better chance of unspooling the tangles of secrets and machinations driving the world of Cridevar.
